entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is remembering past events.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend and companion, who is weak and pale.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's other friend and companion, who is taking charge of their situation.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, who is mentioned as a possible threat.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of followers of Voldemort, who are mentioned as having found Harry and his friends in the past.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends and companions.
Hermione is also a friend of Harry's.
Voldemort is the leader of the Death Eaters.
Ron is a target of the Death Eaters, as they found Harry and his friends in the past.
